name: Daniele of Normandy Company
tag_list: strategy, intelligence, analysis, threat, risk, risk-management, due-diligence, assessment, investigation, marketing, gold, silver, investment, trust, sovereign
overview:
Our company helps government organizations and businesses solve complex problems and build capabilities to deliver a competitive advantage. We guide our clients through periods of transformational change and help them evaluate, quantify and manage their risks. Our approach integrates security risk management into all components of the enterprise, including People, Process and Technology. We are keenly aware that our client’s success depends on how well security is aligned to their strategic business objectives. We transfer our knowledge and expertise to every client to ensure that they gain the edge they need to compete and win in today’s marketplace. The services we provide are:

Strategy Consulting: Let us help you establish your unique position of advantage in the marketplace.

Corporate Intelligence: We possess the expertise to monitor and respond to threats that affect your business.

Information Security: We are leaders in the protection of IT assets and Critical Infrastructure.
